entry.title: Monday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 18. POP 30%
